main event: On December 6, 1956, a sighting involving a dart-shaped object was reported in Miami, Florida.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a dime at arm's length., The sighting was first observed at 10 degrees elevation and 330 degrees azimuth., It was noted that the object had a yellow edge and a green tail., The object was stationary but suddenly veered to the SSW at a very high rate of speed., The sighting lasted for a duration of five minutes.
sighted object: dart-shaped object with yellow edge and green tail
